# PLAYER::SET_PLAYER_CAN_BE_HASSLED_BY_GANGS

## Summary
Sets if thre player can be hassled by gangs

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player
* **BOOL** canBeHassled

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sets whether this player can be hassled by gangs.
